name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience, specializing in back-end lean development with robust skills in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, **microservices architecture**, and **REST APIs**. Proficient in utilizing **NoSQL databases** like **MongoDB**, and strong competency in front-end technologies including **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**. Demonstrated expertise in deploying **Azure Cloud** solutions and implementing containerized deployments.
A proactive and solutions-led mindset, I have effectively delivered high-performance applications within healthcare and financial industries. My technical arsenal includes hands-on experiences with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, along with **Python** and **Flutter** for comprehensive application development. With a focus on building AI/ML-powered platforms, I integrate predictive analytics and automation efficiently. Expertise in compliance-driven development ensures alignment with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards while adeptly navigating MLOps utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
